title: Was a $380M Deal To Sell TGI Fridays Canceled Due to COVID?
subtitle: The COVID-19 pandemic negatively impacted restaurants across the world, but the story of a TGI Fridays deal was unfortunately one of a kind.
author: Jordan Liles
vclaim: A $380 million deal to sell TGI Fridays that was announced in 2019 was canceled on March 31, 2020, because of the oncoming COVID-19 pandemic.
